name: Tonnow Yn-Mysk
description:
Created as a team project for the Creative Card Jam at Falmouth University. This game was made in 4 weeks.

Jam Theme:
- Cornish Mythology
- Escape (Modifier)

Premise:
You live as a humble fisherman. Your job, simple, catch as many fish as you can and avoid the monster!

Controls:
Left Arrow - Sail Left
Right Arrow - Sail Right
Left Shift - Cast Reel

Credits:
Adam Arnett - Writer
Alistar Hambly - Artist
Ben Hooper - Design
Ben Robinson - Design
George Chandler - Design
Hayley Davies - Foley/Programming
Joe Dawes - Programming
Michael Sollars - Programming
Sho Callanan - Artist/Animator
Tega Amrore - Music/Programming
